useCase.name: Generate and Retrieve Fault Management Report

preconditions.precondition: The system must have fault management capabilities.

successEndConditions.condition: The Fault Management Report is successfully generated and retrieved by the Buyer/Client.

useCase.trigger: Buyer/Client initiates the process by making a POST request for a Fault Management Job.

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client sends a POST request for a Fault Management Job.
Fault Management Job progresses into the 'inProgress' state.
Data generation process starts for the Fault Management Job.
Data collection process starts for the Fault Management Report.
Generation and collection processes are successful.
Buyer/Client requests the Fault Management Report.
Fault Management Report content is retrieved and provided to Buyer/Client.
